law.catch_line: KRS 304.15-020 and KRS 304.15-700 to 304.15-720 subject to Subtitle 12 of this chapter.
law.text: The activities regulated by KRS 304.15-020 and KRS 304.15-700 to 304.15-720 shall be deemed the business of insurance and subject to Subtitle 12 of this chapter.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998.
